Exploratory Analysis: Wildfires Chad Oliver 2022-02-09 1 Preface This is an exploratory analysis of Bureau of Land Management wildfire data intended to inspire and guide Kaneri initiatives. The goal of this exercise is to inspire what if more than it is to explain why. 1.1 Disclaimer This is a draft - these are thoughts in progress. I am open to and looking for feedback.
